author: daxian-dbw
body:
Per the discussion at https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5309#issuecomment-342575567, I add the `download.sh` back and make it redirect to `install-powershell.sh`.

/cc @DarwinJS

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: The macOS run was canceled by Travis-CI several times. This change doesn't affect anything in PowerShell, so I will merge it despite the unfinished macOS CI.

title: Revive 'download.sh' and make it redirect to 'install-powershell.sh'
